backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing three frontend feature updates and the files they modify.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files including App.tsx, index.css, tailwind config, and index.html.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH-based design tokens and dark mode values for layout and theme.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with updated favicon references and root mount for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React SPA layout with navigation, sections, images, contact prompt alert, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication, refetching on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider handling Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and auth state management.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles with warm industrial OKLCH palette and dark mode tokens for automotive-themed UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point wiring React, InternetIdentityProvider, React Query client, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending fonts, colors, design tokens, animations, and enabling dark mode and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s current website plan, required image assets, and existing feature set for the Beniwal Music Center site. Includes architectural notes, versioning, and a list of implemented sections and requirements.
